trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of security available to a service endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 요청을 수신 하도록 구성 된 서비스 끝점에 사용할 수 있는 보안 형식을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: WebHttpSecurity provides the security requirements for an endpoint configured with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: WebHttpSecurity에 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 구성 된 끝점에 대 한 보안 요구 사항을 제공합니다

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>값이 지정 되는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>메서드를 다음에 제공 된 설정이 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>속성 서비스 끝점에 적용 됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 값 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>만 설정할 수는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>명시적 매개 변수와 그 값 다시 설정할 수 없습니다 바인딩 인스턴스가 만들어진 후으로 사용 하는 생성자입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode of security that is used by an endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 요청을 수신 하도록 구성 된 끝점에서 사용 되는 보안 모드를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property becomes effective.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 결정 여부에서 설정을 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>속성이 적용 됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that indicates whether transport-level security or no security is used by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> 전송 수준 보안 또는 보안 없이 끝점에서 사용 되는지 여부를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값이 유효한 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 지정 여부는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>속성이 기본값에서 변경 되었으며 serialize 해야 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: This is used for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: 이 XAML 통합에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>고, 그렇지 않으면 직렬화 된 속성 값은 여야 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the Transport property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Transport 속성이 기본값에서 변경 되었습니다 및 serialize 해야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: 이 XAML 통합에 대 한 WCF에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*>고, 그렇지 않으면 직렬화 된 속성 값은 여야 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 이 바인딩의 전송 수준 보안 설정을 포함 하는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> object returned by this property to set the transport security parameters for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 에 대 한 전송 보안 매개 변수를 설정 하려면이 속성에서 반환 된 개체</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> 를 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the Transport property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>값이 지정 되는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>메서드, 다음 서비스 끝점에 적용 됩니다 전송 속성에서 제공 하는 설정을.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the Transport property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>값이 지정 되는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>메서드, 다음 서비스 끝점에 적용 됩니다 전송 속성에서 제공 하는 설정을.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 값 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>만 설정할 수는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>명시적 매개 변수와 그 값 다시 설정할 수 없습니다 바인딩 인스턴스가 만들어진 후으로 사용 하는 생성자입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> for this binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>이 바인딩에 대 한.</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The default values set are a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType*> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType*> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*> = "".
trans-unit.target: 설정의 기본값은 한 <> </> *>의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>, <> </> *>의 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"> </xref>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*>= "".</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*> </xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>
